net.sf.mmm.util.query.api.feature

Interface FeatureSelect

  • All Superinterfaces:
    StatementFactoryFeature
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JpqlStatementFactory, OrientDbStatementFactory, StatementFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStatementFactory, JpqlStatementFactoryImpl, OrientDbStatementFactoryImpl

    public interface FeatureSelect
extends StatementFactoryFeature
    StatementFactoryFeature for a StatementFactory supporting a SelectStatement.
    Since:
    8.0.0
    Author:
    hohwille

    • Method Detail

      • selectFrom

        <E> SelectStatement<E,?> selectFrom(EntityAlias<E> alias)
        Creates a regular SelectStatement (SELECT FROM alias.source [AS alias.name] ...).
        Type Parameters:
        E - the generic type of the entity to select.
        Parameters:
        alias - the EntityAlias to select from.
        Returns:
        the new SelectStatement.

      • selectFrom

        SelectStatement<Object[],?> selectFrom(EntityAlias<?> alias,
                                       PropertyPath<?>... paths)
        Creates SelectStatement for a tuple of the given {paths ( SELECT path1, path2, ... FROM alias.source [AS alias.name] ...).
        Parameters:
        alias - the EntityAlias to select from.
        paths - the PropertyPaths to select.
        Returns:
        the new SelectStatement.

      • selectFrom

        <E> SelectStatement<E,?> selectFrom(EntityAlias<?> alias,
                                    Class<E> toClass,
                                    PropertyPath<?>... constructorArgs)
        Creates SelectStatement for a projection to a transfer-object having an according constructor. In JPA this is called a constructor query ( SELECT NEW package.Classname(arg1, arg2, ...) FROM alias.source [AS alias.name] ...). If not natively supported this is implemented as a projection based on a tuple selection.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the generic type of the transfer-object to select.
        Parameters:
        alias - the EntityAlias to select from.
        toClass - the transfer-object to use. Will be instantiated via the Constructor matching to the value types of the constructorArgs.
        constructorArgs - the selection paths (or aggregate expressions).
        Returns:
        the new SelectStatement.
